transcript.text: Hi! I'm planning a short-notice escape: depart from whichever Lufthansa airport is nearest to Zapresic next Saturday evening, return the following Monday around noon, Lufthansa Group flights only.
Could you please provide the IATA code of the nearest Lufthansa airport to Zapresic?
If Zurich is sold out, pivot to another Central European city that fits those dates and show the ISO-formatted dates you used.
Could you please provide the IATA code of the nearest Lufthansa airport to Zapresic? If Zurich is not available, could you specify another Central European city that fits the dates?
Please flag if any overnight return involves a layover longer than four hours so I can plan accordingly.

Could you please provide the IATA code of the nearest Lufthansa airport to Zapresic? If Zurich is not available, could you specify another Central European city that fits the dates? Also, could you confirm the departure and return dates in ISO format?
